home.subtitle: Developer Relations Engineer
home.aboutMe: Here's where I share my portfolio, including my blog posts, apps, projects, and even some silly JavaScript games. I currently work at Google, where I build sample applications and maintain code snippets for Google Cloud customers. I have a wide range of interests in technology; I tend to focus most on AI/ML, databases, data analytics, and data pipelines. All opinions expressed are mine.
home.heroImageAlt: Me and my very Best Dude
